knimeNode.name: WIFF Converter (remote)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Using a JAX-WS web service, this node converts a wiff file (optionally a .wiff.scan file too) to an open-format and then loads it as per Spectra Reader.

fullDescription.intro: Using ProteoWizard msconvert, via a JAX-WS web service, this node converts an Analyst(tm) wiff file (optionally a .wiff.scan file too) to an open-format and then loads it as per Spectra Reader. As this node accesses a server behind the PCBRC firewall, it is only usable from on-site. Only MS/MS (and higher) spectra are loaded into the output table.
fullDescription.option: Select the files to be converted
Where the converted files are saved
If checked, this node will overwrite existing files otherwise it will abort.
Choose one of mzML (recommended), mzXML or Mascot Generic Format (MGF)

ports.outPort: A table of spectra loaded from the converted files
Contains a metadata summary of each file loaded.
